akn:content.akn:p: § 9706. Dissemination of information The Secretary shall assure that full and complete safety-related information resulting from any project or other activity conducted under this chapter is made available in a timely manner to appropriate committees of Congress, Federal, State, and local authorities, relevant segments of private industry, the scientific community, and the public. (Pub. L. 96–567, § 7, Dec. 22, 1980, 94 Stat. 3332.)
